QuestData.Title: Finest Fungi at the Feast
QuestData.Description:
Fine dining is all about using the finest techniques on the finest ingredients, naturally. The food composed for fine dining is oft locked behind wealth and means, but we would never allow that at The Ruby Feast!
Morsel has informed me of a perfect ingredient for today's theme. One so rare, so exquisite, that it... does not exist yet! Tantalizing, no?
The bronze have uncovered a portal to a dangerous future. One where a black truffle with untold flavor exists!
You must go!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Warden Captain Sinjoirmi at the Temporal Conflux in Thaldraszus.
